locations.name: Dubai
locations.description: A major city in the United Arab Emirates known for its futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, vibrant souks, and surrounding desert landscape.

locations.name: Maldives Resort (representative)
locations.description: Representing a typical luxury resort location within the Maldives archipelago, famed for overwater villas, turquoise lagoons, coral reefs, and providing a tranquil, romantic escape. Exact location varies by specific resort chosen.
